attributes.action: Reject the EU Brexit deal agreed by the conservative government on 08/12/2017!
attributes.additional_details: This deal is not what the British Majority Agreed too!
attributes.background: The British Majority voted to exit the EU not some Lilly livered half hearted agreement with EU!

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what action you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

If you'd like there to be a public vote on the final deal for the UK leaving the EU, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200004
